html:
8.17.20  11:48 pm   Do you have any cool new musical ideas that you can't wait try?

      yes

8.17.20  11:34 pm   I'm really sad that I can't look the way I want to, and it's making me very dysphoric and insecure. Any advice oh master of editing and comedy

      those are 2 useful strategies, but other strategies include movement, clothing, mind tricks ideas,

8.17.20  11:28 pm   has the quality of memes decreased or increased over the years?

      always stays consistant, over-all. science tells us this

8.17.20  11:07 pm   Tips on learning a new instrument with no instructor?

      enjoy

8.17.20  10:56 pm   It's the first day of school what do I do?

      draw a picture of the school

8.17.20  9:53 pm   so when are you going to announce your video album?

      what video album

8.17.20  9:10 pm   What does music mean to you?

      it's like a meaning enhancer

8.17.20  8:43 pm   Hey Bill, how do you create such good rhythm in your music? I've written a lot of poems before and even published some, but comparing them lyrically to some of the stuff you make, I find yours just flows better.

     i think i've spent huge chunks of my life thinking about rhythm. especially at the earlier ages

      I've only published eight of the hundreds I've wrote cause those are the only ones that I ever thought were good enough...

8.17.20  8:41 pm   what happened to the velcro in wfaoie?

      mentioned it, put it on the screen! even recorded a real life sound sample of velcro in its natural habitat

8.17.20  8:40 pm   Discuss the belief that great literature of the twentieth century lacks protagonists who qualify as heroes. (Among the works you discuss, include at least two by the following authors: Anton Chekhov, Virginia Woolf, Ernest Hemingway, F. Scott Fitzgerald, James Joyce, Gabriel Garcia Marquez, Amy Tan, Chinua Achebe.)

      what is this the army or something

8.17.20  8:20 pm   Do you write words or music first?

      hopefully not. they don't survive too well without each other

8.17.20  7:06 pm   What was the best thing before sliced bread?

      sliced meat

8.17.20  6:30 pm   Who inspired you to make music?

      everyone

8.17.20  5:49 pm   why am i stupid

      due to intelligence

8.17.20  5:21 pm   When did you learn how to make music or where did you learn

      at home, and in the work place

8.17.20  5:17 pm   do you ever get ideas from actual dreams that you've had

     yes

      or do you just come up with otherworldly humor on the spot?

      sometimes i ask myself 'what would a dream do'

8.17.20  5:14 pm   When you answer questions, do you answer them chronologically?

     yes

     I want to read them every day in the same order you answered them.

8.17.20  3:58 pm   did you ever get a podcast

     i've gone on podcasts but i'm starting to think i would rather be the host

     or go to hollywood like long, long journey suggested

     i think, in that song, what hollywood meant is wherever movies are made. and by movies, i meant the sort of moving pictures you watch on a screen. which, i should clarify, are mostly watched at home, in this day and age. actually they could also made at home, now that i think about it

8.17.20  3:20 pm   sometimes the song writes itself right? how do you make the song write itself

      sometimes reverse psychology can work. or you can lure it by setting up a situation where a song might like to go

8.17.20  2:59 pm   How do write drums for slower tempo songs 

      what are some slow songs where you've liked the drums

8.17.20  2:02 pm   i cant find my last question what did you do to it you monster

      it's right here

8.17.20  1:19 pm   how do you write melodies in your songs, what's your thought process 

      the context, what is happening in the scene, the words, etc. If there is no scene then imagine a scene. it helps. Situations/words are usually what drives the melody. and, the melody then can continue to drive the words and situations. a symbiotic relationship persists

8.17.20  12:47 pm   what's the best joke you've ever heard bill

      i have never heard a joke

8.17.20  12:41 pm   I love making music, but sometimes I get sad because I know I'm not good at it. Is there a way to get over this feeling?

      no, but you can get good anyway

8.17.20  12:39 pm   Should I come up with a melody or a chord progression first when I write a song?

      try both, and also there's another way which is a lyric first, but, either way, be prepared for it all to happen at exactly the same time, because all these elements always need each other so desperately, they can hardly survive apart. also another thing you might want to try is coming up with starting points for songs and then file them away, and then, as a separate task, choose ones from the list to develop, and/or complete

8.17.20  12:15 pm   what is the best thing?

      ranking systems

8.17.20  12:01 pm   why are your videos so short

      so there can be more of them, or, so i can learn how to do them. either one of those 2 reasons, or in various combinations

8.17.20  11:41 am   Why do you use the same screeching organ sound in a lot of places? Does it resemble something or is it just there for memetic value (for which it is great)

      i use it sort of like an 'instrument'

8.17.20  10:55 am   Bill, you mentioned you are gonna make songs and short video for rest of you life.

     i didn't say that

     
Why do you think making songs and short video for rest of your life is a good idea ?

     i didn't say that

8.17.20  10:28 am   what shall i do if no format fits me, and i'm stuck dreaming about doing everything, when i know that is not possible?

      there are formats for everyone. if you don't think you can find any, it's pretty easy to make up formats

8.17.20  10:23 am   would you have an opening act on tour or would it just be your band?

      just us, but it's possible that we might be able to do an entirely separate set as a different band with the same personel but switched instruments

8.17.20  9:48 am   Thoughts on towels?

      you must keep them dry. dry off your towel with a towel before you use it, to make sure it is dry

8.17.20  8:17 am   Any toughts on giraffes? 

      they're not only tall, but also very wide

8.17.20  8:16 am   How can i get some good inspirations?

      you could spend some time in a mud puddle

8.17.20  7:19 am   what are you thoughts on buildings?

      love them. might build some

8.17.20  6:53 am   What is a Gregorian calendar?

     the calendar we use. the one with january, february, etc

     Is it a calendar imported form Georgia?

     no, pope gregory i think

     The state or the country?

     italy/rome/vatican

8.17.20  6:47 am   How do you solve laziness

      what do you think you should be doing

8.17.20  6:27 am   I know you're learning 3D animation. How is it going?

      i've received my badge of level 00002 so i'm ready to go

8.17.20  6:08 am   don't you think all these questions about Ohio are hurting it's feelings  :( 

      no

8.17.20  5:38 am   how do you music?

      it's really just different combinations of 1 and 2

8.17.20  4:53 am   can you play the guitar?

      maybe a little

8.17.20  4:30 am   when you write a song to say something but it comes out less, do you go back and change it, continue with the new story, or tell the old story and leave the misfire?

      i've had all those things happen before

8.17.20  4:28 am   Is earth flexible?

      yes

8.17.20  3:40 am   why is a fish shaped the way it is

      for your enjoyment

8.17.20  3:35 am   You've said before when one is working on a project to establish a direct line of communication between one's present day self and the one who originally originated it. What does you a year ago who started 3D modeling

     i will say this again, i've barely done any 3D modelling. i think you may have received some 'false information' somewhere along the line

      think about you now who cancelled reinventing the graphics department/learning videomaking?

     didn't cancel it, just had to jump onto the road way way way before i felt 'comfortable enough'. this was predictable, from miles away. i've been through this several times already, so i've come to expect this

8.17.20  3:30 am   are we in a simulation?

      of what

8.17.20  3:24 am   What if there was nothing?

      nothing. then something (to compensate)

8.17.20  2:27 am   Where is Canada?

      northern north america

8.17.20  2:15 am   This is not a question.
Apologies.
Thank you for creating the things you have created, and sharing them with the world. I thoroughly enjoy them, to this day. Your style and humor is unique and impactful. Happy Monday, Bill.

      holy sincere correspondence, you are very friendly

8.17.20  2:12 am   what makes a song a "bop"

      the government
